description:
Guppy is Aoi`s inspiration as an idol and she is also a Futuring Girl user. She appeared as a flashback character in Episode 40, where she sung Summer Summer Vacation!
Guppy is a fair skinned girl with orange-brown hair worn in curly twintails held by frilly pieces of material. Her bangs are straight cut, while her eyes are a bright, clear shade of blue. She often wore makeup.
name: Guppy
